data.script:
<script>
    import {Box, Popover} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Popover.Container logic_id="popover-logic-id">
    <Popover.Button palette="accent">
        Open Popover
    </Popover.Button>

    <Popover.Section alignment_x="right">
        <Box
            palette="inverse"
            elevation="high"
            padding="medium"
            shape="rounded"
        >
            <Popover.Button
                palette="auto"
                variation="clear"
            >
                Dismiss
            </Popover.Button>
        </Box>
    </Popover.Section>
</Popover.Container>
data.title: Popover Logic ID
